content.question: For what value of <math alttext="x"> <mi>x</mi> </math> does the box have the maximum possible volume? Note: The volume of a rectangular solid with length <math alttext="l"><mi>l</mi></math>, width <math alttext="w"><mi>w</mi></math>, and height <math alttext="h"><mi>h</mi></math> is <math alttext="V equals l w h"> <mi>V</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mi>l</mi> <mi>w</mi> <mi>h</mi> </math>.

topic.text: 1.13: Function Model Selection and Assumption Articulation

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Apply numerical results in a given mathematical or applied context.
